header.desc: JWT(Json Web Token) 정보 발급갱신폐기 관리

statement.desc: 기본 태넌트 앱 User 테이블 DDL

commands.statement:
CREATE TABLE "User" ( -- 사용자 NO "UserNo" INTEGER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT "PK_User" PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
-- 사용자 ID "UserID" TEXT NULL,
-- 사용자 명 "UserName" TEXT NULL,
-- 비밀번호 "Password" TEXT NULL,
-- 이메일 "Email" TEXT NULL,
-- 직위 "PositionName" TEXT NULL,
-- 연락처 "Celluar" TEXT NULL,
-- 부서명 "DepartmentName" TEXT NULL,
-- 회사명 "CompanyName" TEXT NULL,
-- 클레임 "Claims" TEXT NULL,
-- 계정인증NO "AccountSignNo" TEXT NULL,
-- 사용자계정ID "UserAccountID" TEXT NULL,
-- 입력일자 "CreatedAt" TEXT NULL );
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS "IX_User_Email" ON "User" ("Email");
INSERT INTO "User" ("UserNo", "AccountSignNo", "Celluar", "Claims", "CompanyName", "CreatedAt", "DepartmentName", "Email", "Password", "PositionName", "UserAccountID", "UserID", "UserName") VALUES (1, NULL, '01012341234', '{"BusinessRole": "Manager"}', 'HandStack', NULL, '개발팀', 'developer@handstack.com', '03ac674216f3e15c761ee1a5e255f067953623c8b388b4459e13f978d7c846f4', '프로', NULL, 'developer@handstack.com', '홍길동');

SELECT UA.UserAccountID , UA.ApplicationID , UA.UserID , UA.UserName , UA.Email , UA.Celluar , UA.PositionName , UA.DepartmentName , UA.CompanyName , UA.BirthDate , UA.Address , UA.Gender , UA.Roles , UA.Claims , UA.ExtendOption , UA.CreatedMemberNo , UA.CreatedAt , UA.ModifiedMemberNo , UA.ModifiedAt FROM UserAccount UA WHERE UA.UserAccountID = @UserAccountID;
SELECT RT.Token , RT.ExpiredAt , RT.ReplacedByToken , RT.RevokedByIP , RT.RevokedAt , RT.CreatedByIP , RT.CreatedAt FROM RefreshToken RT WHERE RT.UserAccountID = @UserAccountID;
SELECT RT.Token , RT.ExpiredAt , RT.ReplacedByToken , RT.RevokedByIP , RT.RevokedAt , RT.CreatedByIP , RT.CreatedAt FROM RefreshToken RT WHERE RT.Token = @Token AND RT.RevokedAt IS NULL;

SELECT UA.UserAccountID , UA.ApplicationID , UA.UserID , UA.UserName , UA.Email , UA.Celluar , UA.PositionName , UA.DepartmentName , UA.CompanyName , UA.BirthDate , UA.Address , UA.Gender , UA.Roles , UA.Claims , UA.ExtendOption , strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', UA.CreatedAt) AS CreatedAt FROM UserAccount UA WHERE UA.UserAccountID = (SELECT UserAccountID FROM RefreshToken RT WHERE RT.Token = @RefreshToken AND RT.RevokedAt IS NULL);

SELECT RT.RefreshTokenNo , RT.UserAccountID , RT.Token , strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', RT.ExpiredAt) AS ExpiredAt , RT.ReplacedByToken , RT.RevokedByIP , strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', RT.RevokedAt) AS RevokedAt , RT.CreatedByIP , strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', RT.CreatedAt) AS CreatedAt FROM RefreshToken RT WHERE RT.Token = @RefreshToken AND RT.RevokedAt IS NULL;

SELECT UA.UserAccountID , UA.ApplicationID , UA.UserID , UA.UserName , UA.Email , UA.Celluar , UA.PositionName , UA.DepartmentName , UA.CompanyName , UA.BirthDate , UA.Address , UA.Gender , UA.Roles , UA.Claims , UA.ExtendOption , strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', UA.CreatedAt) AS CreatedAt FROM UserAccount UA WHERE UA.ApplicationID = @ApplicationID AND UA.UserAccountID = @UserAccountID;

statement.desc: 기존 계정 및 토큰 정보 삭제 후 인증 사용자 정보 입력

commands.statement: INSERT INTO RefreshToken ( UserAccountID , Token , ExpiredAt , CreatedByIP , CreatedAt ) VALUES ( @UserAccountID , @Token , @ExpiredAt , @CreatedByIP , @CreatedAt );
DELETE FROM RefreshToken WHERE UserAccountID = @UserAccountID AND RevokedAt IS NULL AND datetime('now') >= ExpiredAt AND datetime(CreatedAt, '+3 day') <= datetime('now');
UPDATE RefreshToken SET ReplacedByToken = @ReplacedByToken , RevokedByIP = @RevokedByIP , RevokedAt = @RevokedAt WHERE Token = @RefreshToken;
